name: df-right
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cright, cmpt(s0, csur, crab(s1, cfv(cold, cfv(cbday, cv(s0))), wral(s2, csur, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cslt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), cslt, cv(s1))), wcel(cfv(cbday, cv(s1)), cfv(cbday, cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the left options of a surreal. This is the set of surreals that are "closest" on the right to the given surreal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)
